page.title: 06IMPRESIONS OF DENBURY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school building was originally only the hall which is over 100 years old and is made of granite.In 1976 the main part was built.We have three modern open classrooms and a shared practical area with big sinks and several painting tables.We also have a quiet room in which we keep all the library books,the T.V. and the video recorder.There is one mobile classroom on the field at the moment and we are having another one delivered during the summer holidays.We have a field which we play on during the summer and which we use for football during the winter. We have a small garden in which we grow flowers and vegatables .... and weeds.The hole for a pond has been dug and we hope to have some water in it soon. Philip Rhead and Darren Smith
